Class OverviewPlot

java.lang.Object
  de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.svg.SVGPlot
      de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.gui.overview.OverviewPlot
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResultListener, EventListener
public class OverviewPlot
extends SVGPlot
implements ResultListener

Generate an overview plot for a set of visualizations.
